description: From hypocritic + -al, from Ancient Greek ὑποκριτικός (hupokritikós), from ὑποκριτής (hupokritḗs, “actor, hypocrite”), from ὑποκρίνομαι (hupokrínomai, “I play a part on stage”), from ὑπό (hupó, “below”) + κρίνω (krínō, “I choose”).

adjectives.description: hypocritical (comparative more hypocritical, superlative most hypocritical)

entries.meaning: Characterized by hypocrisy or being a hypocrite. [from mid-16th c.]
